price: 8. Mpe tobomaki mingi koleka kati na bango, mpe tosilaki kotanga ndakisa ya bato ya yambo.
arabic: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-ahlaknā ashadda min'hum baṭshan wamaḍā mathalu al-awalīna
